PatientDetails.Name: Joanna Sprague
HospitalCourse: Admitted on 09/19/2024 for NSTEMI and cardiogenic shock.
Underwent percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) and subsequent Impella insertion and removal.
Remains critically ill with ongoing mechanical ventilation, acute kidney injury, and fluctuating neurological status.

ElectronicMedicalRecords.HospitalDischarge: Discharged on 10/05/2024 after complex hospital course with guarded prognosis.

Sepsis.ClinicalNotes: Fever and leukocytosis noted, ongoing monitoring for potential infection during hospital stay.

BloodProducts.TransfusionEvents: Patient transfused 1 unit of packed red blood cells due to anemia.
